EmailTemplate.name: Croydon Youth Board Rhianna
EmailTemplate.subject: The LAST Croydon Youth Board meeting Tuesday!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName}!
Last Youth Board meeting EVER on Tuesday! It is going to be a celebration of your hard work so we are going for a meal at Pizza Express! (please note we are meeting there at a later time than usual)
Tuesday 29th March at 18:30
at:
Pizza Express, 38 St George Street, Croydon
There will be pizza and there will be tears but this is not the end! #LastSupper
See you then! Rhianna
